pr_title: Better separation of MVStore aimed at smaller h2-mvstore jar

timeline.message: better separation of MVStore aimed at smaller h2-mvstore jar

timeline.bodyText: This temporary change shouldn't be here.
timeline.author: katzyn

replies.bodyText: Sorry, of course, it's unintended leftover
replies.author: andreitokar

timeline.bodyText:
I guess this class is a part of public API of standalone MVStore? Maybe we can find a better name for it? DefaultSpatial, SimpleSpatial, something else?
I think it would be nice to have this separate implementation, because users of standalone MVStore should not see methods of our internal Value class in SpatialKey.
timeline.author: katzyn
timeline.diffHunk: @@ -0,0 +1,74 @@ +/* + * Copyright 2004-2020 H2 Group. Multiple-Licensed under the MPL 2.0, + * and the EPL 1.0 (https://h2database.com/html/license.html). + * Initial Developer: H2 Group + */ +package org.h2.mvstore.rtree; + +import java.util.Arrays; + +/** + * Class BasicSpatialImpl. + * + * @author Andrei Tokar + */ +public final class BasicSpatialImpl implements Spatial

replies.bodyText: It's not in public API, this class does not have to be public. Better name - sure.
replies.author: andreitokar
